name: The Bottom of a Sewage Cistern

description.default: It is dark and cramped down here. The air is foul and smells of sewage and wet fur. You notice some strange plants growing in the muck near the wall. Dark passages lead east and west, and a half-flooded tunnel continues north. A rusted iron ladder leads up.

objects.name: iron ladder
objects.description: A rusted iron ladder leads back up to a dark alley in Aethel's Crossing.

objects.name: stirring monster
objects.description: A mass of shadows and wet fur, it huffs angrily.

description.default: The damp, foul smell from the cistern lingers, but a faint scent of woodsmoke and ozone drifts from the east. The tunnel widens here, becoming less of a sewer and more of a passage.

objects.name: stirring monster
objects.description: A mass of shadows and wet fur, it huffs angrily.

description.default: The damp, foul smell from the cistern intensifies here. The darkness is oppressive, and you hear a faint skittering noise from deeper in.

objects.name: stirring monster
objects.description: A mass of shadows and wet fur, it huffs angrily.

description.default: You wade through knee-deep, foul-smelling water. The tunnel, built of ancient, crumbling brick, continues north. The main cistern is to the south.

objects.name: murky water
objects.description: Filthy water flows slowly through the tunnel. You can't see the bottom.

description.default: The tunnel opens into a small, domed chamber that was once a crypt. Stone sarcophagi line the walls, their lids askew. The air is heavy with the smell of dust and decay. The only exit is the flooded tunnel to the south.

objects.name: stone sarcophagus
objects.description: An ancient stone sarcophagus. Its lid has been pushed aside, revealing only darkness within.

description.default: You stand before a massive archway constructed of dark, volcanic stone. Green flames dance in iron braziers, casting long, eerie shadows. To the west lies the sewer network; to the east, the bustle of the Undercity.

The central hub of the Undercity is a chaotic mess of stalls, tents, and shady figures. It is dimly lit by luminescent moss and sputtering torches. To the north stands a dilapidated building marked as a hostel. To the west is the gate to the sewers.
This large, open room smells of stale beer and wet dog. Rows of hammocks and straw mats line the walls. It isn't luxurious, but it's a safe place to rest for those unwelcome on the surface.
